      • historicalVersion

        public org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource historicalVersion​(@Nonnull
                                                                org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                String path,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                String versionUuid)
                                                         throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: VersionsService
        Retrieves a historical version of a versionable / a resource within that versionable.
        Specified by:
        historicalVersion in interface VersionsService
        path - path according to the workspace location of a page, may reach into the page
        versionUuid - the uuid of a historical version of a page
        Returns:
        the resource ( StagingResource ) as it was at the checkin for version {versionUuid}, or null if there was no corresponding resource in the page at that time or if the path doesn't resolve into the version {versionUuid} (e.g. is outside of the versionable)
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        See Also:
        StagingResource, VersionSelectResourceResolver
